title: "R Language Basics: Homework 4"
---

> 1\. (1 point) Create a function that takes a vector as an input, and returns a data frame with
> min, mean, median and max value.

```{r}
x <- c(4,5,6)
f <- function(x){
  df <- data.frame(
    mean = mean(x),
    median = median(x),
    maximum = max(x),
    minimum = min(x),
    print(df)
  )
}
```
